architectureStyle.description: Ostentatious commercial architecture - designed to display wealth, attract customers, and generate profit
keyElements: GOLD, ORANGE, BRONZE everywhere - wealth must be displayed
Large ear motifs in architecture (Ferengi have large ears)
Vault doors and secure storage visible - protecting latinum
Luxurious materials for wealthy clients, cheap materials hidden
Dabo tables and gaming areas visible
Rules of Acquisition displayed on walls
NO military features - profit over warfare
Comfortable for customers, cramped for employees
Every space monetized - even bathrooms cost latinum
architectureStyle.colors: Gold, orange, bronze, copper, with garish neon accents (pink, green, blue)
architectureStyle.materials: Gold plating (often fake), glass display cases, holographic projectors, latinum-colored trim

buildings.name: Tower of Commerce
buildings.description: Ferengi Commerce Authority headquarters. Tallest building, gold-plated, symbol of Ferengi economic power.

buildings.name: Grand Nagus Palace
buildings.description: Residence of the Grand Nagus. Obscenely luxurious, vault of legendary size, throne room for audiences.

buildings.name: Ferengi Trade Mission
buildings.description: Commercial embassy. Negotiation rooms, contract offices, bribery is expected.

buildings.name: Latinum Depository
buildings.description: Bank vault facility. Massive security, stores gold-pressed latinum for wealthy clients.

buildings.name: Auction House
buildings.description: Where valuable items are sold. Grand hall, bidding platforms, display cases.

buildings.name: Casino Complex
buildings.description: Gambling establishment. Dabo wheels, tongo tables, rigged games, hosted by attractive Dabo girls.

buildings.name: Marketplace Grand Hall
buildings.description: Massive indoor market. Hundreds of vendors, everything for sale, constant haggling.

buildings.name: Holosuite Entertainment
buildings.description: Pay-per-use holosuites. Various programs available, premium pricing for premium experiences.

buildings.name: Bar and Grill
buildings.description: Quark's-style establishment. Bar, food, entertainment, gambling, information brokering.

buildings.name: Cargo Warehouse
buildings.description: Storage facility. Secure storage for rent, smuggling compartments available (for a fee).

buildings.name: Shipping Office
buildings.description: Coordinates trade shipments. Insurance, tracking, customs 'facilitation'.

buildings.name: Luxury Hotel
buildings.description: Accommodation for wealthy visitors. Suites priced by the hour, every amenity costs extra.

buildings.name: Salvage Dealership
buildings.description: Buys and sells salvaged goods. No questions asked about origins.

buildings.name: Information Brokerage
buildings.description: Sells secrets and data. Privacy costs extra, everything has a price.

buildings.name: Contract Arbitration
buildings.description: Resolves business disputes. Whoever pays more usually wins.

buildings.name: Investment Firm
buildings.description: Manages wealth for clients. Promises high returns, charges high fees.

buildings.name: Insurance Office
buildings.description: Sells protection and coverage. Many exclusions in fine print.

buildings.name: Apprentice Academy
buildings.description: Trains young Ferengi in commerce. Rules of Acquisition memorization, negotiation practice.

buildings.name: Medical Clinic
buildings.description: Healthcare for profit. Treatment quality depends on payment. Organ sales in back.

buildings.name: Communications Hub
buildings.description: Subspace messaging for a fee. Private channels cost more. May record conversations.

buildings.name: Advertising Agency
buildings.description: Creates promotional content. Holographic ads, subspace commercials, subliminal messaging.

buildings.name: Labor Exchange
buildings.description: Hires out workers. Takes commission from both employer and employee.

buildings.name: Synthehol Brewery
buildings.description: Produces beverages. Cheap ingredients, premium pricing, addictive additives.

buildings.name: Residential Tower
buildings.description: Housing units for rent. Size and quality based on how much you pay. Females live separately (traditionally).
